properties.abstract: On Mittlebärgpass the glacier has all but disappeared so that one has to climb a few metres on brittle rock instead of ice. On Hohsandhorn the signs of global warming are particularly obvious. Nevertheless, Hohsandhorn – in Italian Punta del Sabbione – is a beautiful summit in the middle of pristine nature, from which you have a view reaching from Bernina to Mont Blanc.
properties.subtitle: Signs of global warming in the remotest part of Binntal
properties.title: South-west ridge (from Mittlebärgpass)

sac_photos.title: The Hohsandhorn summit viewed from Mittlebärgpass
